dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2914 IH: Health Coverage Tax Credit Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Turner (for himself, Mr. Golden of Maine, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Kildee) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the health coverage tax credit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Health Coverage Tax Credit Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Extension of health coverage tax credit

subsection.text: Section 35(b)(1)(B) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking before January 1, 2022 and inserting before January 1, 2028.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to months beginning after December 31, 2021.
